@BrgBrigadeKevin @NicholsOnHockey I can see us moving the old wood and keeping core to off-season until d-man trade works out.

@mertoun 12:30 looks good, lunch sounds great. Was planning to be in town anyway tomorrow.
@mertoun Still jets fan then I see. I think you really need to change to another team though. Can’t see them getting better short/med term.

Had he been more patient we could have had a great finish to race. Yes JW started it but to me Tander escalated it.
Looking at replays again Tander was too aggressive to make move and causes carnage. He wasn't in fight until Whincup slowed to let SM back
Whincup deserved win after that driving to build gap before pit stop. To put out consistent qualifying laps mid race like that was amazing
Amazing reading commentary on Bathurst. People really don't like T8. Personally I see the case T8 appealed on. Whincup deserved win after..

@GBen87 yep. Definitely agree about consistency. What I like with Angus is his calmness through out the game.
@TomWelgemoed no, read my bio 😊 ref might not call every time - depends on the impact. Clear in this case it did.

@TomWelgemoed law 19.10 (f) https://t.co/csepRsNJDR seems correct decision to me.
@GBen87 position of players. Smith was already on outside defenders.

@simon_ob might be watching different game. Thought he has been great today. In my eyes he is best ref in world rugby at moment.
